author: Felicity James And Katrina Beavan
title: Defence Force and police to patrol NT highway checkpoints after coronavirus shutdown
description: Travellers are rushing home before strict NT border quarantine measures come into place, requiring 14 days of self-isolation.
content:
Updated 
March 24, 2020 06:46:30
NT Police say Australian Defence Force personnel will join them in monitoring traffic at Northern Territory borders from 4:00pm today in an effort to stop the spread of COVID-19.
